title: Examine: nutrition and supplement information you can trust
description: Examine - Independent scientific information on health, nutrition, and supplements. Everything on Examine.com is backed with citations to published scientific studies.
cleaned_text: Nutrition and supplement information you can trust Examine has no ads or industry ties. We use the latest evidence to find what works and what doesn't. We analyze thousands of studies Examine is by far the largest database of nutrition and supplement research. ... using a constantly updated evidence base The Examine Database is updated daily by our team of expert researchers. ... and without any conflicts of interest Millions of readers rely on our objectivity. No ads, sponsorships, or industry ties.
